name: DLC Incoming (Early version)
description:
Buy and upgrade your game in this idle gamedev game, and start building your new game. 

In this game you will make "DLC" that will be put into the game one by one. In other words, use your money to get more money. 

In this small early version of the game you can build a basic infinite runner game by making "DLC" that upgrades the game while you wait. Wanna play the game you are making? Go ahead play the game and earn just that little more money by getting coins.

Wanna have graphics? Buy em.

Wanna have sound? Buy em.

Wanna get anything in the game? Buy em.

This is a small game that is being published to gain feedback so we can build on the game and publish a better and more polished version in the future.
